verses.name: Psalms 6:1
verses.text: O Lord, rebuke me not in thine anger, neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.

verses.name: Psalms 6:2
verses.text: Have mercy upon me, O Lord; for I am weak: O Lord, heal me; for my bones are vexed.

verses.name: Psalms 6:3
verses.text: My soul is also sore vexed: but thou, O Lord, how long?

verses.name: Psalms 6:4
verses.text: Return, O Lord, deliver my soul: oh save me for thy mercies’ sake.

verses.name: Psalms 6:5
verses.text: For in death there is no remembrance of thee: in the grave who shall give thee thanks?

verses.name: Psalms 6:6
verses.text: I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.
